name: hapax
description:
A bit of a mess made for the Everything is text Jam. Can you find the hidden letter in each level?

Controls

Mouse and left-click for everything

Assets

Made with Godot, using:

Sounds:

https://opengameart.org/content/life-corrupted-binary

https://opengameart.org/content/sound-effects-pack

Fonts:

https://fontlibrary.org/en/font/fira-mono

https://fontlibrary.org/en/font/garoa-hacker-clube-bold

https://fontlibrary.org/en/font/rursus-compact-mono

https://fontlibrary.org/en/font/savate

https://fontlibrary.org/en/font/yahfie
